column1: joseph ""joe"" nicholas fendler| joseph joe fendler
column8: wisconsin. funeral services will be held monday
column10: 2015 at 7:00 p. m. at the picha funeral home in lake delton
column11: wisconsin. visitation will be held at the picha funeral home in lake delton on monday from 3:00 p. m. until the time of the service at 7:00 p. m. joe was born november 21
column14: the son of richard and judith (ingraffia) fendler. he enjoyed target shooting
column16: fishing and spending time with his family. he had a knack for making simple outdoor walks turn into an adventure in nature. joe enjoyed sharing the longest stories of a life well and hard lived. he was a strong believer in protecting and caring for his wife and family. joe gave unconditional love with the toughest hands using the softest touch. joe is survived by his true love
column18: teacher and best friend to his children
column20: donielle and nicolette (tony). he is further survived by his sister
column22: todd murray (wendie); he was an amazing papa to his grandchildren
column24: carter and mattie; he was a special role model to teagan
column25: lizzy and kelso and he loved his nieces and nephews very much. joe is also survived by bridgets 6 sisters
column26: who loved him as their own brother as well as his 3 brothers-in-law. he was preceded in death by his mother
